summary: Result-oriented Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience building apps that reach 100M+ users across 60+ countries. Specializing in Kotlin Multiplatform, Jetpack Compose, IoT solutions, and AI-powered development. Creator of open-source KMM libraries.

experience.title: Android Developer / Backend Developer
experience.description: Secured IoT solution based on Samsung Knox and Android application to protect victims. Full-stack development including new Backend with Spring Boot, REST, Kafka, and Kubernetes.

experience.title: Android Engineer
experience.description: Developed features for the global McDonald's app. Led Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile development, created PoCs and MVPs, presented demos for new features. Organized Android Talks to align team and solve technical issues.

experience.title: Lead Android Engineer
experience.description: Led Android development for 30+ person team. Migrated CI/CD from Bitbucket to GitHub, integrated with Jira, SonarCube, Slack. Mentored 2 junior developers to middle level.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Led mobile team for Adidas GMR - innovative product with Jacquard tag by Google. Built custom Bluetooth Tag emulator for QA. Participated in high-level meetings with Google, Adidas, and Electronic Arts stakeholders.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Built smart home solution from scratch for luxury Silicon Valley houses. Developed Android mobile app, Kiosk Mode tablet app, AWS IoT infrastructure, and Alexa/Google Assistant integrations.

experience.title: Senior Android Engineer
experience.description: Fashion e-commerce app for Europe's fastest-growing tech company (2016). Introduced MVP architecture, initiated Clean Architecture discussions.

projects.name: MTG DeckBuilder
projects.description: Commander deck builder for Magic: The Gathering. Features card search, mana curve analysis, price tracking, and deck export.

projects.name: scryfall-api
projects.description: Kotlin Multiplatform library for the Scryfall API (Magic: The Gathering). Supports JVM, Android, iOS, and JavaScript platforms.

projects.name: wizards-api
projects.description: Kotlin Multiplatform library for Wizards of the Coast APIs. Cross-platform support for MTG-related applications.

projects.name: AndroidLabPokedex
projects.description: Showcasing modern Android development practices with Kotlin, MVVM architecture, and Jetpack components.

achievements.title: Claude Code Power User
achievements.description: Building production apps with spec-kit, Superpowers, and Cowork

achievements.title: MCP Server Developer
achievements.description: Building AI automation tools for internal usage

achievements.title: Android School Creator
achievements.description: Created and launched Android School education course. 14 of 16 attendees were hired by the company.

achievements.title: Android School Instructor
achievements.description: 2nd course of Android School. 6 of 10 students hired by company.

achievements.title: Engineering Manager
achievements.description: Managed team of 4-6 engineers. Completed Software Engineering Manager School.
